metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

properties.description: Cisco Meraki multi rule data connector with template
Cisco Meraki multi rule data connector with template version 2.0.0

connectorUiConfig.title: Cisco Meraki (using REST API)
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown:
The [Cisco Meraki](https://aka.ms/ciscomeraki) connector allows you to easily connect your Cisco Meraki organization events (Security events, Configuration Changes and API Requests) to Microsoft Sentinel. The data connector uses the [Cisco Meraki REST API](https://developer.cisco.com/meraki/api-v1/#!get-organization-appliance-security-events) to fetch logs and supports DCR-based [ingestion time transformations](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/custom-logs-overview) that parses the received data and ingests into ASIM and custom tables in your Log Analytics workspace. This data connector benefits from capabilities such as DCR based ingestion-time filtering, data normalization.

 **Supported ASIM schema:** 
 1. Network Session 
 2. Web Session  
 3. Audit Event

graphQueries.baseQuery: ASimWebSessionLogs | where EventProduct == "Meraki" and EventVendor == "Cisco" and EventOriginalType == "File Scanned"
ASimWebSessionLogs | where EventProduct == "Meraki" and EventVendor == "Cisco" and EventOriginalType == "API Request"

sampleQueries.description: Get Sample of Cisco Meraki IDS Alerts

sampleQueries.query:
union {{graphQueriesTableName}}, ASimWebSessionLogs, ASimAuditEventLogs
 | where EventProduct == "Meraki" and EventVendor == "Cisco"
 | summarize count() by EventOriginalType

dataTypes.name: {{graphQueriesTableName}}
ASimWebSessionLogs
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ASimWebSessionLogs
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)    | where EventProduct == "Meraki" and EventVendor == "Cisco"                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ASimAuditEventLogs
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ASimAuditEventLogs
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)    | where EventProduct == "Meraki" and EventVendor == "Cisco"                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

Read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key)

customs.name: Cisco Meraki REST API Key
customs.description: Enable API access in Cisco Meraki and generate API Key. Please refer to Cisco Meraki official [documentation](https://aka.ms/ciscomerakiapikey) for more information.

customs.name: Cisco Meraki Organization Id
customs.description: Obtain your Cisco Meraki organization id to fetch security events. Follow the steps in the [documentation](https://aka.ms/ciscomerakifindorg) to obtain the Organization Id using the Meraki API Key obtained in previous step.

instructionSteps.description:
Currently, this connector allows to ingest events from the following [Cisco Meraki REST API](https://developer.cisco.com/meraki/api-v1/#!get-organization-appliance-security-events) endpoint: 
 1. [Get Organization Appliance Security Events](https://developer.cisco.com/meraki/api-latest/#!get-organization-appliance-security-events) 
>This connector parses **IDS Alert** events into ASimNetworkSessionLogs Table and **File Scanned** events into ASimWebSessionLogs Table. 
 2. [Get Organization Api Requests](https://developer.cisco.com/meraki/api-latest/#!get-organization-api-requests) 
>This connector parses events into ASimWebSessionLogs Table. 
 3. [Get Organization Configuration Changes](https://developer.cisco.com/meraki/api-latest/#!get-organization-configuration-changes) 
>This connector parses events into ASimAuditEventLogs Table.
instructionSteps.title: Connect Cisco Meraki events to Microsoft Sentinel

columns.name: ts
columns.description: The time at which the data was generated

columns.name: eventType
columns.description: Event Type of the security event.

columns.name: blocked
columns.description: If the action was blocked or not

columns.name: canonicalName
columns.description: Canonical Name of the Client Machine

columns.name: fileHash
columns.description: File Hash of the Scanned File

columns.name: fileType
columns.description: File Type of the Scanned File

columns.name: fileSizeBytes
columns.description: File Size of the Scanned File

columns.name: ts
columns.description: The time at which the data was generated

columns.name: page
columns.description: Page from which configuration was changed

dataFlows.transformKql:
source 
        | where eventType == "IDS Alert" 
        | extend srcIpSplit = split(srcIp,':'), dstIpSplit = split(destIp,':')
        | project-rename TimeGenerated = ts, 
                EventOriginalType = eventType, 
                DvcMacAddr = deviceMac, 
                SrcMacAddr = clientMac, 
                EventOriginalSeverity = priority, 
                EventMessage = message,
                NetworkRuleName = ruleId
        | extend                 
                EventCount = toint(1), 
                EventResult = iif(blocked,"Failure","Success"),  
                EventProduct = "Meraki", 
                EventVendor = "Cisco", 
                Dvc = DvcMacAddr,
                EventType = "Notable",
                SrcIpAddr = tostring(srcIpSplit[0]), 
                SrcPortNumber = iif(array_length(srcIpSplit) == 2, toint(srcIpSplit[1]), int(null)), 
                DstIpAddr = tostring(dstIpSplit[0]), 
                DstPortNumber = iff(array_length(dstIpSplit) == 2,toint(dstIpSplit[1]),int(null)), 
                NetworkProtocol = case(protocol == "tcp/ip", "TCP", 
                                       protocol == "udp/ip", "UDP",
                                       ""), 
                EventSeverity = case(EventOriginalSeverity == "0", "High",
                                EventOriginalSeverity == "1", "Medium",
                                EventOriginalSeverity == "2", "Low",
                                EventOriginalSeverity == "3", "Informational",
                                "Low"), 
                DvcAction = case(
                                blocked, "Deny",
                                "Allow"
                                ),
                AdditionalFields = pack(
                                        "classification",classification,
                                        "sigSource",sigSource,
                                        "signature",signature
                                        ),
                EventStartTime = TimeGenerated, 
                EventEndTime = TimeGenerated
        | extend 
                GeoLocationSrc = geo_location(SrcIpAddr),
                GeoLocationDst = geo_location(DstIpAddr)
        | extend SrcGeoCountry = tostring(GeoLocationSrc.Country),
                SrcGeoLatitude = toreal(GeoLocationSrc.Latitude),
                SrcGeoLongitude = toreal(GeoLocationSrc.Longitude),
                DstGeoCountry = tostring(GeoLocationDst.Country),
                DstGeoLatitude = toreal(GeoLocationDst.Latitude),
                DstGeoLongitude = toreal(GeoLocationDst.Longitude)
| project-away GeoLocationSrc, GeoLocationDst, srcIpSplit, dstIpSplit, blocked, classification, destIp, protocol, sigSource, srcIp

source 
  | where eventType == "File Scanned" 
  | project-rename 
          TimeGenerated = ts,
          EventOriginalType = eventType,
          SrcHostname = clientName,
          SrcMacAddr = clientMac, 
          DstIpAddr = destIp,
          NetworkApplicationProtocol = protocol,
          Url = uri,  
          FileSHA256 = fileHash, 
          FileContentType = fileType, 
          FileSize = fileSizeBytes,
          EventOriginalSeverity = disposition,
          DvcOriginalAction = action
  | extend  
          EventCount = toint(1),
          EventResult = "NA",
          EventResultDetails = "NA",
          EventSchemaVersion = "0.2.5",
          EventProduct = "Meraki",
          EventVendor = "Cisco",
          SrcIpAddr = iff(isnotempty(srcIp),srcIp,clientIp),
          EventSeverity = case(EventOriginalSeverity == "Malicious", "High",
                              EventOriginalSeverity == "Clean", "Informational", 
                              "Low"),
          DvcAction = case(
                            DvcOriginalAction == "Blocked", "Deny",
                            "Allow"
                          ), 
          FileHashType = "SHA256",
          DstPortNumber = toint(destinationPort),
          AdditionalFields = pack(
                                "canonicalName",canonicalName
                                )
      | extend 
          EventStartTime = TimeGenerated, 
          EventEndTime = TimeGenerated,
          GeoLocationSrc = geo_location(SrcIpAddr),
          GeoLocationDst = geo_location(DstIpAddr)
      | extend SrcGeoCountry = tostring(GeoLocationSrc.Country),
              SrcGeoLatitude = toreal(GeoLocationSrc.Latitude),
              SrcGeoLongitude = toreal(GeoLocationSrc.Longitude),
              DstGeoCountry = tostring(GeoLocationDst.Country),
              DstGeoLatitude = toreal(GeoLocationDst.Latitude),
              DstGeoLongitude = toreal(GeoLocationDst.Longitude)
      | project-away GeoLocationSrc, GeoLocationDst, clientIp, destinationPort, srcIp, blocked, canonicalName

source
| extend 
            TimeGenerated = ts,
            EventStartTime = ts,
            EventEndTime = ts,
            EventCount = toint(1),
            EventResult = case(responseCode >= 200 and responseCode <= 299, "Success",
                                "Failure"),
            EventResultDetails = tostring(responseCode),
            EventOriginalResultDetails = operationId,
            EventProduct = "Meraki", 
            EventVendor = "Cisco",
            Dvc = "Meraki",
            EventType = "HTTPsession",
            EventSchemaVersion = "0.2.5",  
            EventOriginalType = "API Request",         
            Url = strcat(host,path,'?',queryString),   
            HttpVersion = "2.0",
            HttpRequestMethod = method, 
            HttpStatusCode = tostring(responseCode),
            HttpReferrer = host,
            HttpUserAgent = userAgent,
            SrcUserId = adminId,
            SrcUserIdType = "UID",
            SrcIpAddr = sourceIp,
            EventProductVersion = case(isempty(version),tostring(1),
                                        tostring(version)),
            GeoLocation = geo_location(sourceIp)
| extend UrlOriginal = Url,
            UserAgent = HttpUserAgent,
            EventSeverity = case(EventResult == "Success", "Informational",
                              "Low"),
            SrcGeoCountry = tostring(GeoLocation.Country),
            SrcGeoLatitude = toreal(GeoLocation.Latitude),
            SrcGeoLongitude = toreal(GeoLocation.Longitude)
| project-away GeoLocation

source
    | project-rename TimeGenerated = ts,
                 OldValue = oldValue,
                 NewValue = newValue,
                 ActorUsername = adminEmail,
                 ActorUserId = adminId
    | extend EventSchemaVersion = "0.1",
          EventCount = toint(1),
          EventResult = "Success",
          EventProduct = "Meraki",
          EventVendor = "Cisco",
          EventSeverity = "Informational",
          ActorUsernameType = "UPN",
          ActorUserType = "Admin",
          ActorUserIdType = "Other",
          AdditionalFields = pack("adminName",adminName),
          Operation = strcat(page,'/',label),
          Object = iff(isnotempty(ssidName), strcat(networkName,'/',ssidName), networkName),
          ObjectId = iff(isnotempty(ssidNumber), strcat(networkId,'/',ssidNumber), networkId),
          ObjectType = "Other",
          EventType = case(isempty(OldValue),"Create",
                           isempty(NewValue),"Delete",
                           "Set"),
          EventStartTime = TimeGenerated,
          EventEndTime = TimeGenerated,
          ValueType = "Other"
    | project-away page, label, networkId, networkName, ssidNumber, ssidName, adminName

connectorUiConfig.title: Cisco Meraki (using REST API)
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown:
The [Cisco Meraki](https://aka.ms/ciscomeraki) connector allows you to easily connect your Cisco Meraki organization events (Security events, Configuration Changes and API Requests) to Microsoft Sentinel. The data connector uses the [Cisco Meraki REST API](https://developer.cisco.com/meraki/api-v1/#!get-organization-appliance-security-events) to fetch logs and supports DCR-based [ingestion time transformations](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/custom-logs-overview) that parses the received data and ingests into ASIM and custom tables in your Log Analytics workspace. This data connector benefits from capabilities such as DCR based ingestion-time filtering, data normalization.

 **Supported ASIM schema:** 
 1. Network Session 
 2. Web Session  
 3. Audit Event

graphQueries.baseQuery: ASimWebSessionLogs | where EventProduct == "Meraki" and EventVendor == "Cisco" and EventOriginalType == "File Scanned"
ASimWebSessionLogs | where EventProduct == "Meraki" and EventVendor == "Cisco" and EventOriginalType == "API Request"

sampleQueries.description: Get Sample of Cisco Meraki IDS Alerts

sampleQueries.query:
union {{graphQueriesTableName}}, ASimWebSessionLogs, ASimAuditEventLogs
 | where EventProduct == "Meraki" and EventVendor == "Cisco"
 | summarize count() by EventOriginalType

dataTypes.name: {{graphQueriesTableName}}
ASimWebSessionLogs
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ASimWebSessionLogs
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)    | where EventProduct == "Meraki" and EventVendor == "Cisco"                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ASimAuditEventLogs
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ASimAuditEventLogs
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)    | where EventProduct == "Meraki" and EventVendor == "Cisco"                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

Read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key)

instructionSteps.description:
Currently, this connector allows to ingest events from the following [Cisco Meraki REST API](https://developer.cisco.com/meraki/api-v1/#!get-organization-appliance-security-events) endpoint: 
 1. [Get Organization Appliance Security Events](https://developer.cisco.com/meraki/api-latest/#!get-organization-appliance-security-events) 
>This connector parses **IDS Alert** events into ASimNetworkSessionLogs Table and **File Scanned** events into ASimWebSessionLogs Table. 
 2. [Get Organization Api Requests](https://developer.cisco.com/meraki/api-latest/#!get-organization-api-requests) 
>This connector parses events into ASimWebSessionLogs Table. 
 3. [Get Organization Configuration Changes](https://developer.cisco.com/meraki/api-latest/#!get-organization-configuration-changes) 
>This connector parses events into a ASimAuditEventLogs Table.
